INSERT INTO giup2(g2_Num, g2_Baedal, g2_Tel, g2_GiupNum, g2_Origin, g2_Memo, g2_Opentime, g2_Minpay) VALUES(giup1_seq.CURRVAL, #{g2_Baedal}, #{g2_Tel}, #{g2_GiupNum}, #{g2_Origin}, #{g2_Memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{g2_Opentime}, #{g2_Minpay})
INSERT INTO giup3(g3_Num, g3_Addr1, g3_Addr2 ,g3_Addr3, g3_Lati, g3_Longti) VALUES(giup1_seq.CURRVAL, #{g3_Addr1}, #{g3_Addr2}, #{g3_Addr3}, #{g3_Lati}, #{g3_Longti})
mapper.select: SELECT g1_Num, g2_Num, g3_Num, g1.g1_Id, g1_Pwd, g1_Name, cat_Code, g1_created, g2_Baedal, g2_Tel, g2_Giupnum, g2_Origin, g2_Memo, g2_Opentime, g2_Minpay, g3_Addr1, g3_Addr2, g3_Addr3 FROM giup1 g1 LEFT OUTER JOIN giup2 g2 on g1.g1_Num=g2.g2_Num LEFT OUTER JOIN giup3 g3 on g1.g1_Num=g3.g3_Num WHERE g1_Id=#{g1_Id} AND g1_Enabled != 0
